'''Secret Archive''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Level 5 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
*Japanese name of the constellation is likely a reference to a mystery novel by Arisugawa Alice titled {{lang|ja=有栖川有栖の密室大図鑑|ja_rm=Arisugawa Arisu no Misshitsu Daizukan|ja_tl=Arisugawa Alice's Illustrated Guide to the Locked Room.|mini=1}}
